# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

# Project name
project(sdl-modbus)

# This setting is useful for providing JSON file used by CodeLite for code completion
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS 1)

set(CONFIGURATION_NAME "Release")

set(CL_WORKSPACE_DIRECTORY ../../workspace)
# Set default locations
set(CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/${CL_WORKSPACE_DIRECTORY}/cmake-build-${CONFIGURATION_NAME}/output)
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})

# Projects


# Top project
# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_sdl-modbus_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}")
set(WORKSPACE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../workspace")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .
    ./include
    ./oss
    ./oss/uSockets
    ./oss/uWebSockets
    ./oss/cpr/include
    ./oss/gl3w
    ./oss/imgui
    ./oss/imgui/backends
    ./oss/imgui_sugar
    ./oss/IconFontCppHeaders
    ./oss/redis++
    ./oss/redis++/tls
    ./oss/redis++/cxx17
    ./oss/redis++/future/std
    ./oss/clips/include
    ./oss/muParser/include
    /usr/include/freetype2
    /usr/include/libpng16
    .

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-fPIC)
add_definitions(-O2)
add_definitions(-std=c++17)
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(-fopenmp)
add_definitions(-std=c99)
add_definitions(
    -DWITH_LIBUV=1
    -DWITH_OPENSSL=1
    -DLIBUS_USE_OPENSSL
    -DFMT_HEADER_ONLY
    -DSPDLOG_FMT_EXTERNAL
    -DUSE_OPENSSL=1
    -DIXWEBSOCKET_USE_OPEN_SSL=1
    -DMQTT_USE_TLS
    -DMQTT_USE_LOG
    -DBOOST_LOG_DYN_LINK
    -DVC_SI_UNITS_ASSERT
    -DIMGUI_IMPL_OPENGL_LOADER_GL3W
    -DREDIS_PLUS_PLUS_USE_TLS=1
    -DLINUX=1
    -DNDEBUG
)


# Linker options


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
link_directories(
    .
    ./libs/ubuntu-20.04
    ./oss/clips/lib
    ./oss/muParser/lib
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -fPIC -O2 -std=c++17 -Wall")

set_source_files_properties(
    ${C_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -fopenmp -O2 -std=c99 -Wall")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(sdl-modbus ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(sdl-modbus ${LINK_OPTIONS})

target_link_libraries(sdl-modbus
    glfw
    GL
    X11
    Xrandr
    Xi
    libmuparser.a
    libclips.a
    hiredis_ssl
    hiredis
    libmodbus.a
    libuv.a
    libhdf5_hl_cpp.a
    libhdf5_cpp.a
    libhdf5_hl.a
    libhdf5.a
    libboost_log.a
    libboost_filesystem.a
    libboost_thread.a
    curl
    resolv
    pthread
    z
    m
    rt
    ssl
    crypto
    stdc++
    dl
)


# Adding POST_BUILD commands
add_custom_command(
    TARGET sdl-modbus
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND strip ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY}/sdl-modbus)
add_custom_command(
    TARGET sdl-modbus
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND echo "Copying the sdl-modbus to ../install/bin directory")
add_custom_command(
    TARGET sdl-modbus
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND cp ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY}/sdl-modbus ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/install/bin/)
